title: What happens if you switch an account's region and u have one on that region under the same name?
body: I have an account on NA and one on OCE. I plan on transfering my OCE account to NA and its under same name and all may i ask what will happen to my NA account. will they be swaped or somthing. becuase i have a SKIn on my Na and i plan on switching my OCE account over what will happen to my NA account

replies.body: If someone else already has your Summoner Name on the region you transfer too, you'll be prompted to choose another name for your account. Your NA account will stay where it is with it's current name, and the OCE account will need to have a new name chosen.

And what about the login name? Because I am currently in NA for 4 months, and I made an NA account. Without thinking, I made it with the exact same login as one of my EUW accounts. But when I return to EU, I'd like to transfer the NA account to EUW. Is that possible?

> [{quoted}](name=RedruMovie,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HzqTBv52,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-12T02:35:00.102+0000)
>
> And what about the login name? Because I am currently in NA for 4 months, and I made an NA account. Without thinking, I made it with the exact same login as one of my EUW accounts. But when I return to EU, I'd like to transfer the NA account to EUW. Is that possible?

Yes should prompt you to change that aswell if already taken.
